name: Old Town Road
description:
Game a Week prototype 8 based on the theme of "A.I." 
Yee-haw partner! One of thuh prisoners 'as managed to break open his cell. Gitty-up after 'em before they manage ta escape!

WASD - Movement
SPACE - Jump

NOTE: I do not own any of the assets I used & the rights belong to their respective owners. This was created purely for educational purposes. 

Song by: handibap3 - cowboy theme (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CMq04yvXAa8)
